org.apache.hadoop.io.retry

Class RetryPolicies.RetryLimited

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.io.retry.RetryPolicies.RetryLimited
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RetryPolicy
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RetryPolicies.ExponentialBackoffRetry, RetryPolicies.RetryUpToMaximumCountWithFixedSleep, RetryPolicies.RetryUpToMaximumCountWithProportionalSleep
    Enclosing class:
    RetryPolicies

    abstract static class RetryPolicies.RetryLimited
extends Object
implements RetryPolicy
    Retry up to maxRetries. The actual sleep time of the n-th retry is f(n, sleepTime), where f is a function provided by the subclass implementation. The object of the subclasses should be immutable; otherwise, the subclass must override hashCode(), equals(..) and toString().

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.apache.hadoop.io.retry.RetryPolicy

    • Method Detail

      • shouldRetry

        public RetryPolicy.RetryAction shouldRetry(Exception e,
                                  int retries,
                                  int failovers,
                                  boolean isIdempotentOrAtMostOnce)
                                    throws Exception
        Description copied from interface: RetryPolicy

        Determines whether the framework should retry a method for the given exception, and the number of retries that have been made for that operation so far.

        Specified by:
        shouldRetry in interface RetryPolicy
        Parameters:
        e - The exception that caused the method to fail
        retries - The number of times the method has been retried
        failovers - The number of times the method has failed over to a different backend implementation
        isIdempotentOrAtMostOnce - true if the method is Idempotent or AtMostOnce and so can reasonably be retried on failover when we don't know if the previous attempt reached the server or not
        Returns:
        true if the method should be retried, false if the method should not be retried but shouldn't fail with an exception (only for void methods)
        Throws:
        Exception - The re-thrown exception e indicating that the method failed and should not be retried further

      • calculateSleepTime

        protected abstract long calculateSleepTime(int retries)
